column6: THIS IS IT!! THE MARVEL UNIVERSE'S LAST STAND!  The Chaos King unleashes his ultimate attack against reality as we know it -- and our survival depends on a boy, his god, and their ragtag band of allies: The Mighty Thor! The Incredible Hulks! The Dead (and Living?) Avengers! The X-Men! Alpha Flight! But are they enough to stand against THE ANTI-ETERNITY ... The force that seeks to negate all existence itself? In this issue, the universe dies and everyone wins! ...What?
column8: | writer:Greg Pak | writer:Fred Van Lente | penciller:Khoi Pham
